Control.Tooltip: Delete the marker if you don't want a marker, or set it to whatever character or string you want

Control.Name: label_minIncomingHeal
Control.Tooltip: Healing taken below this value will not be shown

Control.Name: label_minOutgoingHeal
Control.Tooltip: Healing done below this value will not be shown

Control.Name: label_minOutgoingDamage
Control.Tooltip: Damage done below this value will not be shown
